ATTACKS


card namegutsdamagepow/intspecial effect
Tail Attack44powhalf damage even if dodged
Bite46pow--
Combination48powmust be used with tail attack and bite. does not use the guts and damage listed on those cards. damages all opponents monsters.
Wing Cutter54powdamages all air monsters
Spinning Claw55powif hit monster cant attack next turn
Dragon Punch58pow--
Trample712pow--
Dragon Combo814poweven if dodged does half damage
Fire Breath43intdamages all ground monsters


SPECIAL


card namegutseffect
Throw Away0makes opponent monster aerial for one turn; monster can attack


DEFENSES


card namegutsblk/dgeeffect
iron scales0blk-3 damage on pow attack
